text: Colombo Strikers (formerly Colombo Stars and Colombo Kings) is a professional franchise cricket team that plays in the Lanka Premier League (LPL). They were formed in 2020, and represent Sri Lanka's Western Province. The team play their home matches at the R. Premadasa Stadium in the capital city of Colombo. ==References== Category:Lanka Premier League teams Category:2020 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Colombo Strikers
